price: And [there is a sign in the story of] ‘Ād, when We sent against them the devastating barren wind[11].
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ
footnotes: [11] Devoid of all goodness such as carrying rain or fertilizing trees.
